item.title: Baichuan Alignment Technical Report
item.description: Baichuan Alignment significantly boosts large language model performance via refined training, superior data strategies, enhanced capabilities, and rigorous evaluation, achieving up to 28% user experi…

item.title: DM-Codec: Distilling Multimodal Representations for Speech Tokenization
item.description: DM-Codec, a novel speech tokenizer, uses distillation to integrate acoustic, semantic, and contextual information, significantly improving speech tokenization accuracy.

item.title: How Many Van Goghs Does It Take to Van Gogh? Finding the Imitation Threshold
item.description: Researchers discover text-to-image models start reliably imitating concepts from training data after seeing 200-600 examples, offering crucial insights for copyright and privacy.
